Text:
BayImg doesn't handle PNG transparency very well..
Sadly!

#'s 1, 3, and 4 are excellent digital editions.  #2 is not a bad scan but the pages don't quite line up which frustrating considering how many two-page layouts are used.  #5 is the largest file but drastically incomplete.  The complete art pieces are missing entirely although it appears all the pages containing text are included.
